scripts.build:all: npm run build:users && npm run build:payments && npm run build:frontend
scripts.clean:frontend: rm -rf static/frontend/js/* static/frontend/css/* static/frontend/assets/* frontend/dist frontend/.vite
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:users && npm run clean:payments && npm run clean:cart && npm run clean:frontend

scripts.dev:full: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run build:users:dev" "python manage.py runserver"
